review_data.title: Take-away coffee
review_data.content: We took coffee takeout at the restaurant opening, definitely intrigued to go back to taste the food. Coffee was good and service friendly and prompt.

review_data.title: Underwhelming and overpriced
review_data.content: Was pretty underwhelmed by food and service. Quite pricey for what it is, better to go to the Mezze place at Europaallee.

review_data.title: Alles bestens
review_data.content: So eine ruhige Atmosphäre ! Das Essen ist oft unterschiedlich gut. Sehr schude Innendekoration. Verhältnis Preis und Qualität stimmt ausgezeichnet.More

review_data.title: Super orientalisches Essen mit äusserst freundlichem Service

review_data.title: Frische und gute Qualität
review_data.content: Die Auswahl dürfte zwar etwas abwechslungsreicher sein, aber das Angebot der Speisen ist top. Alles immer frisch und gut abgeschmeckt....More

review_data.title: Good lunch option in Europaallee
review_data.content: The restaurant proposes a middle-east buffet. The food is good with a lot of choice. The restaurant is well decorated and there is also terrasse. I recommend Yalda for lunch.

review_data.title: Mehrmals besucht, sehr gut!
review_data.content: War schon mehrmals hier und immer Gutes zu Mittagessen gefunden! Grosse Auswahl and Mittelmeer, nordafrikanischen und Nahosten Gerichte. Buffet Format...More

review_data.title: Good place for lunch
review_data.content: It's a place near some big office buildings which it'd make it normally very popular during lunch hours. It's offering both vegetarian and non-vegetarian options and it's using the model where you scoop whatever you want on your plate and then you pay for the...More

review_data.title: Danke!
review_data.content: Super sympatisches und nettes Personal, die viel zu der angenehmen Atmosphäre beigetragen haben! Würde wegen ihnen wieder kommen

review_data.title: Beyrouth, Tel Aviv and New York in the same place
review_data.content: Excellent food, nice design, simple service. Slightly highly priced but OK for the Europa Allee which starts to be the area to be.

review_data.title: Gutes Preis-Leistungs Verhältnis

review_data.title: Super nice
review_data.content: Yalda is conveniently located and perfect for a cosy night out with friends. The food is delish, especially the chicken and the böreks are lovely.

review_data.title: Dinner after sports
review_data.content: I went there with some friends after the gym, healthy and yummy food and very nice service! I recommend it!

review_data.title: High price for Zurich mediocre food bad service
